about_the_game:
Poker Warlords is a genre-defying strategy game that blends poker betting with autobattler combat. The big idea is simple: the cards you get dealt transform into armies! Each card is random—sometimes you'll get a powerful max count of Dragons, and sometimes you'll get a pathetic 2 Footmen. You have to know when to hold 'em and when to fold 'em!




When the hand ends, the battle begins! Armies clash in fast-paced autobattler combat where the last unit standing takes the pot. Focus on outthinking your opponents—no need to micromanage your armies. It’s a game of skill, luck, and outmaneuvering your foes!




Poker Warlords challenges you to think on your feet and outplay your opponents. Bluff to keep them guessing, counter their units in the arena, and plan the perfect moment to strike. With every hand dealt, you'll face new opportunities to flex your strategic muscle and outmaneuver the competition. The gameplay is easy to pick up, but its layers of depth ensure you’ll keep coming back for more.




Earn your place on the leaderboard or enjoy casual games with friends. Unlock rare avatars, customize your experience, and enter high-stakes competitions. Poker Warlords is free-to-play and features no pay-to-win mechanics—just skill, strategy, and style.


From the creators of BattlePoker, a top 10 StarCraft II™ arcade game, Poker Warlords brings innovation to poker and autobattlers alike. With years of refinement and a passionate community, it’s time to bring this unique concept to the Steam audience!
